name: The Hunger (DimenionsXYZ)
description:
Always hungry. Always looking for the next meal. But what happens when carrots aren't enough?

You play as Hunger Bunny; a cute little bunny who has two problems.

1. The Foxes who stole all his carrots and special treats. They're always trying to prevent Hunger Bunny from eating them.

2. The Hunger that lives deep within you.

Never can you eat enough or can you to stave the hunger away. Always on the edge of being satiated and hungry, guide Hunger Bunny through the deep throws of the Bunny village burrows, eating carrots as you go. Avoid the foxes as they will kick you back to the start. And make sure, above all else, you eat or you will face the wrath of The Hunger!

Hit the download button and install. Double tap on the Bunny icon to begin your adventure. Compatible with a controller or Keyboard. All you need is to give Hunger Bunny a gentle tap in the direction you want him to go in and he'll do the rest.
